title: The humorous lieutenant, or, Generous enemies a comedy as it is now acted by His Majesties servants, at the Theatre-Royal in Drury-Lane.
author: Fletcher, John, 1579-1625.
publisher: Printed for H.N., and sold by William Chandler, and Ralph Smith,
notes: Sometimes attributed jointly to Francis Beaumont and John Fletcher.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
